properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where RegistryKey contains "\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Internet Settings" and (not((RegistryKey contains "\\Accepted Documents" or RegistryValueData =~ "Binary Data" or RegistryValueData startswith "DWORD" or (RegistryValueData in~ ("Cookie:", "Visited:", "(Empty)")) or (RegistryKey contains "\\Cache" or RegistryKey contains "\\ZoneMap" or RegistryKey contains "\\WpadDecision"))))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects modification of the registry settings used for Internet Explorer and other Windows components that use these settings. An attacker can abuse this registry key to add a domain to the trusted sites Zone or insert javascript for persistence
